# Random
# Pint has the abbreviation Bq capitalized
@alias becquerel = bq

# Land use
square_meter = meter ** 2 = m2
cubic_meter = meter ** 3 = m3
square_meter_year = m2 * year = m2y = m2a
cubic_meter_year = m3 * year = m3y = m3a

# Gas volume at given conditions
[gas_volume] = [pressure] * [volume]
standard_cubic_meter = atmosphere * (meter ** 3) = sm3
normal_cubic_meter = 1.0732 * standard_cubic_meter = nm3

# Livestock
livestock_unit = [livestock] = LU

# Separative work: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Separative_work_units
separative_work = [enrichment] = SW
separative_work_unit = kilogram * SW = SWU

# Freight
[freight] = [mass] * [length]
ton_kilometer = metric_ton * kilometer = tkm

# Vehicular travel
vehicle = [vehicular_travel]
vehicle_kilometer = vehicle * kilometer = vkm

# Personal travel
person = [personal_travel]
person_kilometer = person * kilometer = pkm
